content: Browsed through the brainstorming document for the "SMART on FHIR/HSPC Developers" conference, and it looks very interesting. Due to company travelling restrictions (public sector) I will not have the possibility to join the conference live, so wondering if the conference material will be available after the conference (e.g. PowerPoints, demos, Videos etc).

@Henrik After doing a survey, we found that your situation is not unique, so we are postponing to early 2017 to give everyone as much time as possible to get travel arrangements. I'm currently working with the sponsors and EHR vendors that will be presenting to find a time that works for everyone. Stay tuned, I hope to have a date within the next week.
